body: This belt grants the wearer an enhancement bonus to two physical ability scores (Strength, Dexterity, or Constitution) of +2, +4, or +6. Treat this as a temporary ability bonus for the first 24 hours the belt is worn. These bonuses are chosen when the belt is created and cannot be changed.
name: Belt of Physical Might
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Wondrous Items/Belt/Belt Slot Wondrous Items/Belt of Physical Might
